q: Grizzlies in Carmelo Anthony 's return Allen Iverson raced downcourt and floated an alley-oop lob that Carmelo Anthony shoved one-handed through the hoop for an arena-rattling jam, one that seemed to holler to all their doubters, "Take that!" We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together, Carmelo Anthony said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. "We know there's a lot of doubt about that." NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . NASDAQ: GOOG) today announced financial results for the quarter and the fiscal year ended December 31, 2010. "Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year," said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google Inc. . Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web. announced plans to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Starting from April 4, Larry Page, Google Inc. Co-Founder, will take charge of Google Inc. 's day-to-day operations
